name: Tiger Tank 59 Ⅰ Break The Fog
name_original: Tiger Tank 59 Ⅰ Break The Fog
description:
"Tiger Tank 59" is a top-down shooting game

In this game , Players need to control their tanks,
through the enemy lines, break the enemy base,
or defeat the enemy tanks

Features

The Fog Of War Over the battle filed.

up to 20 kinds of enemy tanks
up to 10 kinds of player tanks weapons
up to 20 missions
